text: Kim Won-hae (born April 6, 1969) is a South Korean actor. He is best known as a former cast member of SNL Korea (season 1–4). ==Personal life== In August 2020, it was reported that Kim tested positive for COVID-19 and was receiving treatment. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
